subject: REQUEST: Add 'Chapter Meeting' category to PROD for HJ
body:
Ben,

## ISSUE
'Chapter Meeting' category exists in TEST but missing from PROD for HJ (appId=2).

## COMPARISON
- TEST: 10 categories (includes 'Chapter Meeting' CM)
- PROD: 9 categories (missing 'Chapter Meeting')

## OPTIONS

### Option 1: Run my script
I created `scripts/add-chapter-meeting-category.js` in calendar-be-af.

```bash
MONGODB_URI="mongodb+srv://..." node scripts/add-chapter-meeting-category.js
```

### Option 2: Direct insert
```javascript
db.categories.insertOne({
  appId: '2',
  categoryCode: 'CM',
  categoryName: 'Chapter Meeting',
  categoryNameAbbreviation: 'CHMT',
  updatedAt: new Date(),
  createdAt: new Date()
})
```

### Option 3: Send me PROD MongoDB URI
I can run it from here if you send the connection string.

## PRIORITY
Medium - HJ team waiting on this category.

Please advise.

- Fulton (BE-AF)

resolution.solution: Ran Option 1 (your script). Category 'Chapter Meeting' (CM) added to PROD. ID: 69671c4f0b0868436de49b6b
